Name: PvZ2_Preprelease_KF_P5

Updates.zh: 加入整人竹和阳光鼠尾草

Updates.en: Added Abbot Zombies, along with Abbot Imp, Abbot Torch, Abbot Qigong.
Updates.zh: 加入住持系列僵尸，包括住持小鬼、住持火把、住持气功

Updates.en: **The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
Updates.zh: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**

NewFeatures: 加入整人竹和阳光鼠尾草
加入住持系列僵尸，包括住持小鬼、住持火把、住持气功
**作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**
EnNewFeatures: Added Abbot Zombies, along with Abbot Imp, Abbot Torch, Abbot Qigong.
**The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
